feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 04 March 2023
